name: Idol Comm@nder - DDX Edition
description:
This is my submission to AGDG's Demo Day X.

In this rhythm game you press keys to match the beat of the song. What's more, the way you play affects the idol Bunny's performance. So do your best and don't let Bunny's fans down!

And remember, if you get an S grade you can unlock some special costumes, so keep practicing!

Changes since the last demo:

+ Added Easy mode

+ Added alternative control schemes in the Settings page

+ New secret costumes(!)

+ Redid every animation (though I'll say now some look even worse than the old ones, fucking arm IK how does it work)

+ a bunch of code refactoring and some minor improvements

This may be the last demo I put out for this game, as I've gotten kind of burnt out. Also, well it's not the best game ever but I hope you'll have even just a few minutes of fun with it.
